3.rawvalue:
For details on building and configuring ***your*** dashboard please familiarise yourself with the concepts outlined in 
[this presentation][1] and collate your own set of key operational statistics and spreadsheets.  

At the moment you will need some hand-holding and support from the team at [hypernumbers][2] to customise this application. Please e-mail me at gordon@hypernumbers.com or phone me on (+44) 07776 251669 (UK Time).


  [1]: http://www.slideshare.net/dmc500hats/startup-metrics-for-pirates-long-version
  [2]: http://hypernumbers.com
